metadata.inclusion:
- Click [Add] icon in Z-Wave PC Controller Program
- Press a Func_Button 1 time in SHP-TB100Z (Smart Button)
- If Inclusion Process is successful, LED is Blinking 3 times in SHP-TB100Z
metadata.exclusion:
- Click [Remove] icon in Z-Wave PC Controller Program
- Press a Func_Button 3 times quickly in SHP-TB100Z
- If Exclusion Process is successful, LED is Blinking 5 times in SHP-TB100Z
metadata.reset:
Please use this procedure only in the event that the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
Press a Func_Button for 10 seconds in SHP-TB100Z
- If Factory Reset Process is successful, LED is Blinking 1 time in SHP-TB100Z
- Device Reset Locally notification is Transmitted
